price: Sabõda haka ku yi tafiya a cikin ƙasa watã huɗu,* kuma ku sani lalle kũ, bã mãsu buwãyar Allah ba ne, kuma lalle Allah ne Mai kunyatar da kãfirai.
arabic: فَسِيحُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَرۡبَعَةَ أَشۡهُرٖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّكُمۡ غَيۡرُ مُعۡجِزِي ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡزِي ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: * Bãyan yanke sulhu, Allah Yabai wa kãfirai watã huɗu na amãna, dõmin su ƙãre harkõkinsu da wasu ma'amalõli da suka ƙulla tãre da Musulmi, sa'an nan yãƙi ya tãshi. Anã nufin mãsu addinin al'ãda na shirki a nan.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fasīḥū fī al-arḍi arbaʿata ashhurin wa-iʿ'lamū annakum ghayru muʿ'jizī al-lahi wa-anna al-laha mukh'zī al-kāfirīna
